original_text: The fourth angel blew his trumpet, and a third of the sun was struck, and a third of the moon, and a third of the stars, so that a third of their light might be darkened, and a third of the day might be kept from shining, and likewise a third of the night.
korean_text: 넷째 천사가 나팔을 부니 해 삼분의 일과 달 삼분의 일과 별들의 삼분의 일이 타격을 받아 그 삼분의 일이 어두워지니 낮 삼분의 일은 비추임이 없고 밤도 그러하더라

sentences.original_text: The fourth angel blew his trumpet
and a third of the sun was struck
and a third of the moon
and a third of the stars
so that a third of their light might be darkened
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들의 빛의 삼분의 일이 어두워지게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: and a third of the day might be kept from shining
sentences.korean_translation: 낮의 삼분의 일이 빛을 잃게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: and likewise a third of the night
sentences.korean_translation: 이와 같이 밤의 삼분의 일도 그렇게 되려 함이라
